elements.text: You are writing in your journal and start to flip back through some previous entries. You notice how much your handwriting has changed and begin to worry about your ability to journal in the future. You begin to brainstorm other ways to keep track of your thoughts and feelings and soon feel confident that you can...

elements.name: Journaling Issues_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
